title: What Happens to People
lyrics:
What happens to people?
Their lives up in arms
What happens to people?
They quit holding on
What happens to people
And what can they do?

They're only returning

The powers of youth

What happens to people?

What happens to you?

What happens to people

When their lives fade from view?



Can't end it

Your face is lost to me

Lost to me me

Now it's ending

The rules remain

On the page

On the page



What happens to people?

They quit holding on

What happens to people?

Their dreams turn to dark

The rust in your castle

You're trying to fill



Old lady

Let me into your rotting house

Your rotting house

Old man

Take a step back

And figure it out

Figure it out



Old lady

Oil your engine

You're rusting out

You're rusting out

Old man

Cover your branches

Winter is coming

Beware



What happens to people?

They quit holding on

Then they're locked out

Locked out

They get locked out

They get locked out
